pages.title: Mana Management
pages.text: When things are placed around that $(item)Pure Daisy$(), it will use the ambient $(thing)Mana$() to Purify them, transforming them into something else. If this is done with $(item)Wood Logs$() and $(item)Foggy Stones$() harvested from the $(thing)Misty World$(), it'll turn them into $(item)Livingwood$() and $(item)Livingrock$() respectively. These materials are, as such, attuned to the $(thing)Mana$() in the atmosphere, and

can be used to focus and direct it for more refined uses. $(br)To get started, use some more $(item)Mushrooms$() to make an $(item)Endoflame$(), which coalesces $(thing)Mana$() from burning$(thing)furnace fuels$() dropped nearby. This will need to be linked to a $(item)Mana Spreader$(), which should in turn be pointed at a $(item)Mana Pool$(). $(br)For finer control of linking, a $(item)Wand of the Forest$() may be required.

pages.heading: Endoflame
pages.description: Add $(item)Water$(), then drop $(item)Mushrooms$() in, and finish by dropping in any $(item)Seed$().

pages.text: Can use any combination of 2 $(item)Mushrooms/Petals$(). The colours used will be visible on the $(item)Wand$().
